title: PE用give指令附魔出现错误求教
author: qu1feng
txt_content: rt give附魔出现line 1 column 2 missing ｝or object member name的问题怎么肥四

replies.author: 破损的鞘翅
replies.txt_content: PE无法使用give指令给物品附魔

replies.author: z253823009
replies.txt_content: pe命令中目前无法使用enchant nbt标签，只能通过外部更改，目前已知nbt标签有can_placed_on和can_destroy

replies.author: ancba
replies.txt_content: PE不能有give获得附魔，获得附魔有单独的一个命令
